about_the_game:
In this world,salt is monopolized,peaceful−thoughts are mandatory.

A boy who had a war-thoughts and was about to die was able to get a job collecting garbage in a garden and survived. One day, he meets a fairy in the garden and ......

―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――

Overview

This game is a roguelike 3D parkour action where you run through randomly generated 3D fields and collect as much trash as you can in time. The more trash you collect and the more thrilling & stylish you look, the more “salt” you earn. The salt you gain can be used to strengthen your body or ingested to survive.

◆Counteract fall damage

In a random field with height differences, you will repeatedly climb to high places and jump down to low footholds. In this game, falling damage is present, but it can be nullified by activating “Anti-Impact” by pressing the button at the right moment at the moment of landing and kicking off surrounding enemies.

The tension you feel when you jump down from a high place while dodging enemy attacks and the sense of accomplishment you get when you land on your feet is intense.

◆Randomly generated fields

The field changes every time the game starts. This tests the player's ability to improvise. As the game progresses, more vicious and challenging fields will appear.

◆Dystopian world shrouded in mystery

In a dystopia created by a mysterious organization that exclusively controls “salt,” thoughts are continually measured by a thought tag embedded in your mind. You do not get salt because you are not a “peaceful thinker.”

name: Fall in Flowers
short_description: "Fall in Flowers" is an exhilarating & thrilling 3D action game where you must jump and land successfully on a field of towering like buildings. Work to survive in a dystopian world created by a mysterious organization that controls a monopoly on salt, and discover the truth about the world.
